1.Title: Open Trauma
1.Description: When Corin's <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color> hits an enemy, her DMG against the target increases by 12% for 15s.
1.Lore:
"The young mistress always said, if something's worth doing, it's worth focusing on."
"I've been practicing, and I can do it now!"
"But... are you watching me...?"

2.Title: Atomic Smash
2.Description: When Corin's <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color> hits an enemy, the target's <color=#F0D12B>Physical RES</color> is reduced by 0.5%, stacking up to 20 times and lasting 5s. The duration of each stack is calculated separately.
2.Lore:
"Sorry, Mr. or Ms. Ethereal!"
"But I've got work to do... I really am sorry!"
Feeling guilty, Corin sincerely apologizes to the monster — as she wields her savage chainsaw, slicing through the enemies in her way.

3.Title: Amateur Maid
3.Lore: "I—I'll do my best to become a good maid!" Corin said, walking towards the Ethereals, chainsaw in hand.

4.Title: Battlefield Retainer
4.Description: When Corin uses a <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>, she recovers 7.2 Energy. This effect can trigger once every 16s.
4.Lore:
A diligent and serious young maid, Corin always puts her heart and soul into everything she does.
Of course, that includes taking out enemies in combat.

5.Title: Special Ops Maid
5.Lore:
"Uh... sorry, I'm so clumsy. I don't know how to make sure my cuts are even..."
—Said Corin as she looked down at the bits of Ethereal scattered across the ground.

6.Title: Accumulated Release
6.Description:
When Corin's extended slash hits an enemy, she obtains a stack of Charge (max 40 stacks).
During a <color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Assist Follow-Up</color>, when her chainsaw detonation hits an enemy, consumes all stacks of Charge. Each stack consumed causes the attack to deal an additional 3% of ATK as DMG.
6.Lore:
Corin knows that she isn't the most powerful of maids, nor the smartest. But she hopes to become the hardest working.
She puts to good use everything she's ever learned.

DescriptionByLevel.1: After holding or tapping repeatedly, when Corin unleashes a continuous extended slash with her Chainsaw, the skill's DMG increases by <color=#2BAD00>18.7%</color>.
DescriptionByLevel.2: After holding or tapping repeatedly, when Corin unleashes a continuous extended slash with her Chainsaw, the skill's DMG increases by <color=#2BAD00>21.8%</color>.
DescriptionByLevel.3: After holding or tapping repeatedly, when Corin unleashes a continuous extended slash with her Chainsaw, the skill's DMG increases by <color=#2BAD00>25%</color>.
DescriptionByLevel.4: After holding or tapping repeatedly, when Corin unleashes a continuous extended slash with her Chainsaw, the skill's DMG increases by <color=#2BAD00>28.1%</color>.
DescriptionByLevel.5: After holding or tapping repeatedly, when Corin unleashes a continuous extended slash with her Chainsaw, the skill's DMG increases by <color=#2BAD00>31.2%</color>.
DescriptionByLevel.6: After holding or tapping repeatedly, when Corin unleashes a continuous extended slash with her Chainsaw, the skill's DMG increases by <color=#2BAD00>34.3%</color>.
DescriptionByLevel.7: After holding or tapping repeatedly, when Corin unleashes a continuous extended slash with her Chainsaw, the skill's DMG increases by <color=#2BAD00>37.5%</color>.

MathSkill.Title: Additional Ability: Cleanup Assistance
MathSkill.Description:
When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
Corin deals 35% more DMG to Stunned enemies.

106100001.Title: Basic Attack: Wipeout
106100001.Description:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Unleashes up to 5 slashes, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Repeatedly press or hold the button during the 3rd and 5th hits to extend the chainsaw slash attack.

106100002.Title: Special Attack: Clean Sweep
106100002.Description:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Special> to activate:
Unleashes a series of slashes upon enemies in front, before detonating the chainsaw, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Repeatedly press or hold the button to extend the chainsaw slash attack.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill, and DMG taken is reduced by 40%.

106100003.Title: EX Special Attack: Skirt Alert
106100003.Description:
With enough Energy, press <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to activate:
Unleashes a series of powerful slashes upon enemies in front, before detonating the chainsaw, dealing massive <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Repeatedly press or hold the button to extend the chainsaw slash attack at the cost of Energy if the attack connects.
Character is invulnerable during the spinning slash.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased during the extended slash, and DMG taken is reduced by 40%.

106100004.Title: Dodge: Shoo!
106100004.Description:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Evade> to activate:
A quick dash dodge.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

106100005.Title: Dash Attack: Oopsy-Daisy!
106100005.Description:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a dodge to activate:
Slashes enemies in front, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Repeatedly press or hold the button to extend the chainsaw attack's duration.

106100006.Title: Dodge Counter: Nope!
106100006.Description:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color> to activate:
Slashes enemies in front before detonating her chainsaw, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Repeatedly press or hold the button to extend the chainsaw slash attack.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

106100007.Title: Chain Attack: Sorry...
106100007.Description:
When a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> is triggered, select the character to activate:
Unleashes a powerful slash at enemies in a small area, dealing massive <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Repeatedly press or hold the button to extend the chainsaw slash attack.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

106100008.Title: Ultimate: Very, Very Sorry!
106100008.Description:
When Decibel Rating is at <color=#FFFFFF>Maximum</color>, press <IconMap:Icon_UltimateReady> to activate:
Unleashes a powerful slash at enemies in a small area, dealing massive <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Repeatedly press or hold the button to extend the chainsaw slash attack.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

106100010.Title: Quick Assist: Emergency Measures
106100010.Description:
When the active character is launched, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Slashes enemies in front before detonating her chainsaw, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Repeatedly press or hold the button to extend the chainsaw slash attack.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

106100011.Title: Defensive Assist: P—Please Allow Me!
106100011.Description:
When the character on field is about to be attacked, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze.
This skill excels at parrying enemy attacks and reduces the consumption of <color=#FFFFFF>Assist Points</color> when the character is under intense attacks.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

106100012.Title: Assist Follow-Up: Quick Sweep
106100012.Description:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> after a <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color> to activate:
Unleash a series of slashes against enemies in front followed by an explosive chainsaw, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Repeatedly press or hold to extend the chainsaw slash attack.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
